Referenties

  1. Bruss√©, C.A. & Linden, C.S. van der (2010). Leidraad kleine spoedeisende aandoeningen. Houten: Bohn Stafleu van Loghum.
  2. Fritz, R.L. & Perrin, D.H. (1989). Cold exposure injuries: prevention and treatment. Clin Sports Med, 8(1), 111-28.
  3. Giesbrecht, G.G. & Wilkerson, J.A. (2006). Hypothermia, Frostbite and Other Cold Injuries: Prevention, Survival, Rescue and Treatment. Seattle: The mountaineers books.
  4. Golant, A. e.a. (2008). Cold exposure injuries to the extremities. J Am Avad Orthop Surg, 16(12), 704-15.
  5. Jurkovich, G.J. (2007). Environmental cold-induced injury. Surg Clin North Am, 87(1), 247-67, viii.
  6. Long, W.B. e.a. (2005). Cold injuries. J Long Term Eff Med Implants, 15(1), 67-78.
  7. Millet, J.D. e.a. (2016). Frostbite: Spectrum of Imaging Findings and Guidelines for Management. Radiographics, 36(7), 2154-2169.
  8. Parsons, K. (2002). Human Thermal Environments: The Effects of Hot, Moderate, and Cold Environments on Human Health, Comfort, and Performance. Boca Raton: CRC Press.
  9. Petrone, P., Asensio, J.A. & Marini, C.O. (2014). Management of accidental hypothermia and cold injury. Curr Probl Surg, 51(10), 417-31.
  10. Sachs, C. e.a. (2015). The triaging and treatment of cold-induced injuries. Dtsch Arztebl Int, 112(44), 741-7.
  11. Spaans, I.M., Machielse, P. & Weststrate, K.J. van (2010). Procedures in de spoedeisende hulp. Houten: Bohn Stafleu van Loghum.
